snippet: The National Republican Senatorial Committee told a Republican advertising firm that it would not receive any contracts with the committee because of its work with a group that targets incumbent Senate Republicans.
abstract: The National Republican Senatorial Committee told a Republican advertising firm that it would not receive any contracts with the committee because of its work with a group that targets incumbent Senate Republicans.

headline.main: Republican Campaign Committee Pushes Back Against Conservative Group
headline.print_headline: G.O.P. Arm Warns Firm Targeting Incumbents
